CustomField.description: [#EPH-7598] Deal Object - Subsidy fields redesign for Invoicing US-0008755 - Deals - Subsidy Formula Corrections - Subsidy_Forecast__c
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(( TODAY() <= EBH_DealTrackingEndDate__c ),(TODAY() >= EBH_DealEndDate__c)), ((EBH_SoldItems__c * EBH_Subsidy__c) - (EBH_SoldItems__c * EBH_Subsidy__c * Non_Payout_Items_Estimate_N__c)), 0 )
CustomField.label: Subsidy Forecast
